page.title: 11A ROOF OVER OUR HEADS
page.content: There are old{farm houses}scattered fairly evenly over our 12km squares the land being flat and of similar agricultural quality. The village which dominates the rectangle under study has expanded rapidly since the 1960's and.The majority of the dwellings are of this era or later. Most of the development has been {private estates}composed of{semi {detached}houses. There is a{council {estate}but this only represents a small proportion of the houses in the village. The{detached houses}which are few in number are large up market dwellings and modern smaller houses. A private estate is being built at the moment by{Westbury}homes and a trip around the village gives an impression of a dormitory village serving{Bridgwater}and{Taunton}of recent construction.
